reviewText: Excellent film, and having read all of Chandlers novels, of all the actors who played the famous detective Philip Marlowe, none brought Marlowe's character to life better than George Montgomery. This is by far the best Marlowe ever and it is unfortunate that Montgomery did not go on to do a series.
old tape but still serviceable. movie was enjoyable. I would use this seller again The portrayal of Marlowe by George Montgomery was not a good choice.
